short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize and download code from GitHub repositories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify the review and summarization of GitHub repositories.
Features:
- Code Summarization: Extracts content from selected code files.
- Custom Selection: Choose specific file extensions and subdirectories.
- Search and filter dirs for big repos.
- Saved Preferences: Retain your extension choices to avoid repetition.
- GitHub API Integration: Fetches up-to-date repository data.
- Personal Access Token Support: Enhance API limits and functionality with your GitHub token.
- Download Summaries: Save combined summaries for offline access or sharing.
- Token Count: Displays estimated tokens for language model usage.
- Directory Tree Structure: Includes the repository's directory tree for better navigation.
